channel.title: Setting up Github for RSPS the CORRECT way?
channel.description: Well, the thing is, my last try with github ended up with people logging in my account and changing stuff around. Also, my username + password were showed in the character file. How would I make it so nobody can see the character file and not be able to hack my account?

item.title: Setting up Github for RSPS the CORRECT way?
item.dc:creator: @RSCShadow RSCShadow
item.description:
@RSCShadow wrote:

You can make git ignore a directory.

https://help.github.com/articles/ignoring-files
http://gitready.com/beginner/2009/01/19/ignoring-files.html

Read full topic
item.source: Setting up Github for RSPS the CORRECT way?

item.title: Setting up Github for RSPS the CORRECT way?
item.dc:creator: @Fridder Fridder
item.description:
@Fridder wrote:

You could try to save the character files on your desktop… I don’t really know if that would work or not.

Read full topic
item.source: Setting up Github for RSPS the CORRECT way?
